title: Stuck Sync 2022.01.03-beta
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `2022.01.03-beta`

OS & Version: Linux

#### Description

After updating to `2022.01.03-beta` yesterday, some of my servers stopped syncing. It worked for a while then just start spitting back `GoodPeers` and nothing else.
